page.title: 09ARTS AND CRAFTS IN ARNPRIOR
page.content: One mile north of Arnprior, on the road to the Lake of Mentieth is Tipperdarroch and in the farmhouse is one of the smallest workshop studios in Scotland. Using a modern micro electronic dental drill, diamond burrs and rubber polishers, the craft of hand engraved glass is carried out by a craftswoman who claims to find much of her inspiration from the natural beauties of the surrounding country. In a world of mass production many people appreciate a present which has been hand crafted and a personal touch is often added by way of initials and dates. Commissions find their way to all parts of the world - America, Russia, India and Australia for example. Each piece of hand engraved crystal glass is unique and signed by the engraver.
